name.baseName: Remediated soil ; Ex-situ soil remediation ; Biopile ; Remediatied soil off-site landfill ; Off-site clean soil backfilling
修复后土壤;异位修复;生物堆;处理后土壤异地填埋;基坑外运清洁土回填

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The contaminated soil is treated by ex-situ bioremediation (biopile) in the temporary facility on site. The contaminated soil was excavated with a backhoe. Backfilling was done with mine waste material transported by barge to Hopedale in 1-m3 bags. The contaminated soil was transported by dump truck to the treatment facility. Construction of the treatment facility included qualified supervisory staff travelling from Kingston, ON, the preparation of a containment area with a 0.76-mm high-density polyethylene (HDPE) liner, and soil heaping. The biopile was passively aerated with polyvinyl chloride (PVC) and perforated HDPE pipes that protruded from the soil. Granular fertilizers (urea and diammonium phosphate) were mixed into the soil. Treatment consisted of periodic visits by local staff to manage the leachate that was redistributed over the pile or filtered before it was released to the environment. Monitoring consisted of a visit by a qualified supervisor from Kingston at the end of treatment for sampling. The treated soil was disposed of and spread in the Hopedale unlined landfill. At the end of the facility’s life cycle, materials were disposed of in the landfill.

在方案A中，受污染的土壤在现场临时设施中通过非原位生物修复（生物文件）进行处理。被污染的土壤是用反铲挖掘的。用驳船运至霍普代尔的1立方米袋装矿山废料进行回填。被污染的土壤用自卸卡车运到处理设施。处理设施的建设包括合格的监督人员从安大略省金斯敦出发，准备一个带有0.76mm高密度聚乙烯（HDPE）内衬的隔离区，以及堆土。用聚氯乙烯（PVC）和从土壤中突出的穿孔HDPE管对生物膜进行被动充气。颗粒肥料（尿素和磷酸二铵）被混合到土壤中。处理包括当地工作人员定期访问，以管理渗滤液，这些渗滤液在排放到环境中之前被重新分配到垃圾堆上或过滤。监测包括在治疗结束时由金斯敦的一名合格监督员进行抽样访问。处理后的土壤被处理并摊铺在霍普代尔无衬砌垃圾填埋场。在该设施的生命周期结束时，材料被丢弃在垃圾填埋场。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: Defining the functional unit as “the treatment of 112 m3 of soil contaminated with diesel to an acceptable risk level over the short term” .

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: Soil contaminated with diesel fuel was identified in a residential/commercial area of Hopedale, NL, Canada.
在加拿大NL霍普代尔的一个住宅/商业区发现了被柴油污染的土壤。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The contaminated soil is treated by ex-situ bioremediation (biopile) in the temporary facility on site. The contaminated soil was excavated with a backhoe. Backfilling was done with mine waste material transported by barge to Hopedale in 1-m3 bags. The contaminated soil was transported by dump truck to the treatment facility. Construction of the treatment facility included qualified supervisory staff travelling from Kingston, ON, the preparation of a containment area with a 0.76-mm high-density polyethylene (HDPE) liner, and soil heaping. The biopile was passively aerated with polyvinyl chloride (PVC) and perforated HDPE pipes that protruded from the soil. Granular fertilizers (urea and diammonium phosphate) were mixed into the soil. Treatment consisted of periodic visits by local staff to manage the leachate that was redistributed over the pile or filtered before it was released to the environment. Monitoring consisted of a visit by a qualified supervisor from Kingston at the end of treatment for sampling. The treated soil was disposed of and spread in the Hopedale unlined landfill. At the end of the facility’s life cycle, materials were disposed of in the landfill.

在方案A中，受污染的土壤在现场临时设施中通过非原位生物修复（生物文件）进行处理。被污染的土壤是用反铲挖掘的。用驳船运至霍普代尔的1立方米袋装矿山废料进行回填。被污染的土壤用自卸卡车运到处理设施。处理设施的建设包括合格的监督人员从安大略省金斯敦出发，准备一个带有0.76mm高密度聚乙烯（HDPE）内衬的隔离区，以及堆土。用聚氯乙烯（PVC）和从土壤中突出的穿孔HDPE管对生物膜进行被动充气。颗粒肥料（尿素和磷酸二铵）被混合到土壤中。处理包括当地工作人员定期访问，以管理渗滤液，这些渗滤液在排放到环境中之前被重新分配到垃圾堆上或过滤。监测包括在治疗结束时由金斯敦的一名合格监督员进行抽样访问。处理后的土壤被处理并摊铺在霍普代尔无衬砌垃圾填埋场。在该设施的生命周期结束时，材料被丢弃在垃圾填埋场。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process applies to environmental remediation, specifically employing ex-situ bioremediation techniques such as biopile treatment to rehabilitate soil contaminated with diesel fuel. The process involves the excavation, treatment, and off-site disposal of the treated soil and the use of backfilling with mine waste materials. This process is relevant for residential and commercial areas requiring clean-up operations to reduce contamination to acceptable risk levels over the short term.
所述工业过程适用于环境修复，具体采用异位生物修复技术（如生物堆处理）来恢复受柴油污染的土壤。该过程涉及挖掘、处理和处理后土壤的异地处置，以及采用矿山废料进行回填。该过程适用于需要清理操作以将污染降低到短期内可接受风险水平的住宅和商业区域。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Sanscartier D ,Margni M ,Reimer K , et al. Comparison of the Secondary Environmental Impacts of Three Remediation Alternatives for a Diesel-contaminated Site in Northern Canada [J]. Soil and Sediment Contamination: An International Journal, 2010, 19 (3): 338-355.

Sanscartier D ,Margni M ,Reimer K , et al. Comparison of the Secondary Environmental Impacts of Three Remediation Alternatives for a Diesel-contaminated Site in Northern Canada [J]. Soil and Sediment Contamination: An International Journal, 2010, 19 (3): 338-355.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set, users should take into account the site-specific nature of soil remediation. The data includes construction and operation of the treatment facility without consideration of personnel travel, which is deemed site-specific and therefore excluded. Users should ensure methodological congruence with their case-specific parameters, particularly when considering the transportation of contaminated materials, the presence of a qualified supervisory staff, the type of aeration system used for the biopile, the type of liners and fertilizers involved, and the end-of-life disposal method for materials. If applying this data to other location-specific cases, the user must adjust for local conditions, regulatory requirements, and transportation distances.

使用此数据集时，用户应考虑土壤修复的场地特性。数据包括处理设施的建设和操作，但未考虑人员旅行，因为这被视为具有场地特异性，因此排除在外。用户在使用数据时应确保与案例特定参数的方法论一致性，特别是考虑到污染材料的运输、合格监督人员的在场、用于生物堆的通风系统类型、内衬和施肥类型以及材料生命周期结束的处理方法。如果将此数据应用于其他具有特定位置的案例，用户必须根据当地条件、监管要求和运输距离进行调整。

completeness.common:other: The personnel transportation provided in the original text was not input into this system because it has certain site specificity.
原文所给出的人员运输没有被输入到本系统内，因为考虑到该人员运输具有一定的场地特异性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
